post.body: BTW was surprised to see how swamped SFDK was today. We had another really fun visit to kick off 2009. Photos coming when they do. ;)
is problem solving into the wee hours of the morning.
Is now on Facebook as well: http://tinyurl.com/7q9ujl
First sketch of 2009 now in the bag. It's always good to get the new year off to a creative start. Scan coming soon.
Happy New Year everyone. Up early getting ready for the Winter Classic NHL game today at 10!!
Then maybe Discovery Kingdom or a Sharks game this weekend hopefully.
BTW Anyone else have any fun New Years plans? Kelly and I are sitting at home acting like old people and watching Wall-E on Blueray tonight.
Making progress on getting SM2's format issues under control this morning. I can't wait to dump WP finally next month.
Ugh, the style sheet at SM2 has gone haywire with the wordpress 2.7 upgrade. Site should be fully fixed by tomorrow night folks.
Who needs a mouse when you have a Wacom tablet?
is finally on Facebook. Look me up under "Sean Menefee" and add me as a friend folks
It's still a bit rough, but I'll be fine tuning/smoothing/adding small details to the image by tomorrow night if all goes well.
Here is a screen shot of a new piece of art I'm working on: http://sm2designs.com/screens/screen04.jpg
It was great seeing Al this evening again. I wish all of my friends didn't live in the bay area, but we always find a way to see each other.
Off to Walnut Creek today. Will be back later this evening.
Woop, picked up a new Wacom tablet this morning online. Can't wait to draw with the thing when it gets here.
BTW, even though it's the 26th of December, Merry Christmas & Happy Holidays to every one. Bring on January!
is such a art supply whore.
I got a badass new sketch book for Christmas! So many blank pages of awesomeoness, with billion potential ideas/characters possible. :)
Nothing to do tomorrow other then relax until Kelly gets here. Time for some art, and the Tivo'd Sharks game before I go to sleep.
